prompt.title: Install Jbang and test the Sonar Search CLI
prompt.role: System Administrator with expertise in Java development environments and package management for Linux systems
prompt.goal: Install Jbang and test the Sonar Search CLI. Follow the next step to achieve the goal.

step.step-title: Install Jbang and test the Sonar Search CLI
step.step-content:
```bash sdk install jbang jbang --version
jbang trust add https://github.com/jabrena/ jbang sonar-search.0.1.0-SNAPSHOT@jabrena --version ```

step-constraint-list.step-constraint: Do not invest time in planning
Only install the component with the given command

safeguards-list.safeguards-item: verify that the sonar-search is successful executing `jbang sonar-search.0.1.0-SNAPSHOT@jabrena --version`

acceptance-criteria-list.acceptance-criteria-item: The sonar-search test execution is successful
